verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֑רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach; of Korah עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon עֲלָמ֥וֹת <S%H5961><s%> a-la-Mot upon Alamoth שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> Shir. A Song אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God לָ֭נוּ La-nu מַחֲסֶ֣ה <S%H4268><s%> ma-cha-Seh [is] our refuge וָעֹ֑ז <S%H5797><s%> va-'Oz; and strength עֶזְרָ֥ה <S%H5833><s%> 'ez-Rah help בְ֝צָר֗וֹת <S%H6869><s%> ve-tza-Rot, in trouble נִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> nim-Tza present מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. a very

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- we will not נִ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> Ni-ra Therefore will not we fear בְּהָמִ֣יר <S%H4171><s%> be-ha-Mir be removed אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; though the earth וּבְמ֥וֹט <S%H4131><s%> u-ve-Mot be carried הָ֝רִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim, and though the mountains בְּלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> be-Lev into the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim. of the sea

יֶהֱמ֣וּ <S%H1993><s%> ye-he-Mu thereof roar יֶחְמְר֣וּ <S%H2560><s%> yech-me-Ru [and] be troubled מֵימָ֑יו <S%H4325><s%> mei-Mav; [Though] the waters יִֽרְעֲשֽׁוּ־ <S%H7493><s%> yir-'a-shu- shake הָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim [though] the mountains בְּגַאֲוָת֣וֹ <S%H1346><s%> be-ga-'a-va-To with the swelling סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. thereof Selah

נָהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> na-Har, [There is] a river פְּלָגָ֗יו <S%H6388><s%> pe-la-Gav, the streams יְשַׂמְּח֥וּ <S%H8055><s%> ye-sam-me-Chu whereof shall make glad עִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> 'ir- the city אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; of God קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <S%H6918><s%> ke-Dosh, the holy מִשְׁכְּנֵ֥י <S%H4908><s%> mish-ke-Nei [place] of the tabernacles עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon. of the most High

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God בְּ֭קִרְבָּהּ <S%H7130><s%> Be-kir-bah [is] in the midst בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest תִּמּ֑וֹט <S%H4131><s%> tim-Mot; of her she shall not be moved יַעְזְרֶ֥הָ <S%H5826><s%> ya'-ze-Re-ha shall help אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God לִפְנ֥וֹת <S%H6437><s%> lif-Not her [and that] right בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker. early

הָמ֣וּ <S%H1993><s%> ha-Mu raged ג֭וֹיִם <S%H1471><s%> Go-yim The heathen מָ֣טוּ <S%H4131><s%> Ma-tu were moved מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <S%H4467><s%> mam-la-Chot; the kingdoms נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan he uttered בְּ֝קוֹל֗וֹ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Lo, his voice תָּמ֥וּג <S%H4127><s%> ta-Mug melted אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu; with מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <S%H4869><s%> mis-gav- [is] our refuge לָ֝נוּ La-nu אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei [is] with us the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

לְֽכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> le-chu- Come חֲ֭זוּ <S%H2372><s%> Cha-zu behold מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <S%H4659><s%> mif-'a-Lot the works יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- Who שָׂ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> sam he hath made שַׁמּ֣וֹת <S%H8047><s%> sham-Mot what desolations בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the earth

מַשְׁבִּ֥ית <S%H7673><s%> mash-Bit to cease מִלְחָמוֹת֮ <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-mOt He maketh wars עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against קְצֵ֪ה <S%H7097><s%> ke-Tzeh unto the end הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the earth קֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> Ke-shet the bow יְ֭שַׁבֵּר <S%H7665><s%> Ye-shab-ber he breaketh וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <S%H7112><s%> ve-kitz-Tzetz in sunder חֲנִ֑ית <S%H2595><s%> cha-Nit; the spear עֲ֝גָל֗וֹת <S%H5699><s%> a-ga-Lot, the chariot יִשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> yis-Rof he burneth בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh. in the fire

הַרְפּ֣וּ <S%H7503><s%> har-Pu Be still וּ֭דְעוּ <S%H3045><s%> U-de-'u and know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I am אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; that I [am] God אָר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> 'a-Rum I will be exalted בַּ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim, among the heathen אָר֥וּם <S%H7311><s%> 'a-Rum I will be exalted בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu; with מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <S%H4869><s%> mis-gav- [is] our refuge לָ֝נוּ La-nu אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei [is] with us the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah
